attributes.action: pass legislation requiring banks to pay bonuses to their biggest investor- the taxpayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems highly unfair that whislt billions of pounds from the taxpayer was used to bailout ailing banks, that it is the few that reap million pound bonuses. How abount paying bonuses to the banks biggest investor, who kept them 'alive' - the taxpayer.
